abstract: Sotheby's teams up with search engine start-up Artsy in an unconventional online-only sale featuring all types of contemporary art that uses technology in its conception or as its subject.
lead_paragraph: The auction house will collaborate with the start-up Artsy on an online-only sale of contemporary art in late October.

headline.main: Sotheby’s Auction Coming to an Art App Near You
headline.print_headline: Sotheby’s Auction Coming to an Art App Near You

snippet: The auction house will collaborate with the start-up Artsy on an online-only sale of contemporary art in late October.
